name: commands
description: List down all the commands of the bot

name: viewcountries
description: Get a list of countries in the server.

name: viewregions
description: Get a list of regions/states of a country in the server.

options.name: country
options.description: View country's regions/states

name: viewlocations
description: Get a list of arcade location roles in the server.

options.name: location
options.description: Get a list of arcade locations from this region/state/country

options.name: country
options.description: The country the location is in, for easier filtering

examples: <>viewlocations [state/region name/ state/region code], [country name/ country code]

name: rank
description: Add/remove a location role from yourself

options.name: location
options.description: Location role to add/remove

examples: <>rank [location name/ number selection] - Used after calling <>selectRegion or <>viewlocations to select a rank/role to add/remove from yourself. You can also select multiple roles separated with a comma (,).

<>rank [location name/ country code (if no regions/states)/ keyword search] - Used to search a role in the server. If only 1 result is found, the role will be added/removed from yourself. Otherwise, the search results will be displayed.
<>rank [location name/ country name/ country code/ number selection] - Used after calling <>rank that returns multiple results, you can only pick 1 result at a time.

name: video
description: Search a song's chart from youtube. Usually from takepu dancerush/Eijiken channel.

options.name: title
options.description: Title of song to search

options.name: difficulty
options.description: Song difficulty

options.name: guide
options.description: Dance guide for a song. Type "default" for no dance guide for a chart that uses one

examples: <>takepu [song name] - Get a song's charts, defaults to normal chart.
<>takepu [easy | normal | easyguide:name | normalguide:name] [song name] - Get a song's chart of selected difficulty. Use 'guide:name' to include a dance guide

name: song
description: Search a song's info, using its title or matching filters.

options.name: eng
options.description: Search a song's info, using its title or matching filters.

options.name: title
options.description: Title of song to search. Use "*" to use only filters.

options.name: artist
options.description: Song Artist

options.name: folders
options.description: Folder(s) or Song genre

options.name: label
options.description: Custom BEMANI icons in the song's jackets

options.name: easy
options.description: Level of song on Easy/かんたん difficulty

options.name: normal
options.description: Level of song on Normal/ふつう difficulty

options.name: level
options.description: Level of song on any difficulty

options.name: random
options.description: Set to true to select a random song from the matching results (defaults to false)

options.name: 中文
options.description: 輸入一首歌曲的名稱（或簡稱、代名詞）來搜尋資料。

options.name: 曲名
options.description: 必填。輸入你想搜尋的歌名，如果不想指定歌名搜尋的話，請輸入「*」。

options.name: 作曲者
options.description: 作曲者

options.name: 歌曲類型
options.description: 歌曲資料夾或是歌曲類型。

options.name: label
options.description: 歌曲所屬的虛擬廠牌。通常會標記在歌曲封面。

options.name: 簡單
options.description: 等級（簡單難度）

options.name: 普通
options.description: 等級（普通難度）

options.name: 等級
options.description: 等級（任何難度）

options.name: 隨機
options.description: 輸入「true」以開啟隨機選曲，會在符合搜尋條件的範圍內隨機選出一首歌。預設為「false（關閉）」。

name: serverinvite
description: Receive a DM for an invite for the DANCERUSH STARDOM server.

name: invite
description: Receive a DM for the bot's invite for your server.

name: whitelist
description: Limit a bot to specific channels. Leave id to clear whitelist.

options.name: ids
options.description: channel ID to limit bot in, separated by commas.

examples: <>whitelist [channel IDs] - Limit bot to inputted channel IDs, separated by commas.

name: checklocation
description: Check the list of all players in your area

options.name: location
options.description: Location to check

name: announce
description: Use Mottie to post in #announcements channel.

options.name: message
options.description: Use em<emoji_id/name_here> to insert animated emojis

name: songs
description: Search a list of songs of matching filters.

options.name: eng
options.description: Search multiple song/s info, using its title or matching filters.

options.name: title
options.description: Title of song to search. Use "*" to use only filters.

options.name: artist
options.description: Song Artist

options.name: folders
options.description: Folder(s) or Song genre

options.name: label
options.description: Custom BEMANI icons in the song's jackets

options.name: easy
options.description: Level of song on Easy/かんたん difficulty

options.name: normal
options.description: Level of song on Normal/ふつう difficulty

options.name: level
options.description: Level of song on any difficulty

options.name: 中文
options.description: 輸入歌曲的名稱（或簡稱、代名詞）來搜尋資料。

options.name: 曲名
options.description: 必填。輸入你想搜尋的歌名，如果不想指定歌名搜尋的話，請輸入「*」。

options.name: 作曲者
options.description: 作曲者

options.name: 歌曲類型
options.description: 歌曲資料夾或是歌曲類型。

options.name: label
options.description: 歌曲所屬的虛擬廠牌。通常會標記在歌曲封面。

options.name: 簡單
options.description: 等級（簡單難度）

options.name: 普通
options.description: 等級（普通難度）

options.name: 等級
options.description: 等級（任何難度）

examples: <>songs | artist: TAKA | level: 5 - Get all songs that has "TAKA" in the artist name, and where the Easy/Normal difficulty is 5.
<>songs 50th Memorial | easy: 2 - Get all songs with "50th" or "Memorial" in its name and is Level 2 in Easy difficulty.

name: mottiesays
description: Use Mottie to post in a channel of your choice.

options.name: message
options.description: Use :emoji_id/name_here: to insert animated/global emojis

options.name: channel
options.description: Channel to announce in
